reviews.author: E.N. Byron
reviews.review: I've rented from Fast Property for 5 years now, and the experience has been nothing short of delightful. They're quick to respond to maintenance requests, everyone is so kind, and they really go above and beyond to keep the property looking nice.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review. We really appreciate your kind words! -Anna

reviews.author: Tracey Lee
reviews.review: I'm 60 yrs old, and I have rented the same apartment in Woodland Townhomes since Aug 2012 (almost 11 yrs.) Speaking only from my own personal experiences.. Kris & Kim Fast have always been polite to me.. if your honest with them, if you

ownerResponse.text: Tracey, thank you so much for the recommendation! We are grateful to have had you as a tenant for over a decade. -Anna

reviews.author: Nate Fearer
reviews.review: I've been a tenant at a Fast PM property for a year now, and the folks at Fast have always been friendly, professional, and super quick to send maintenance people when things break. My wife and I have had a great experience with them ...and that's not usually something tenants say of PMs.

ownerResponse.text: Nate, thanks for the kind words! We are happy to have the two of you as tenants. I appreciate you taking the time to write a review. -Anna

reviews.author: Kyle B
reviews.review: Really helpful management company. The 1 issue I've had in the multiple years renting with them they had someone out that day to check out the issue and get it fixed.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the kind words, Kyle. We appreciate you taking the time to write a review! -Anna

reviews.author: Michie C
reviews.review: The property manager Anna is extremely kind & considerate. Whenever something isnt working, maintenance fixes it promptly. I also like that there is ample parking and the grounds are very well kept. You cant ask for a better place to live

ownerResponse.text: Michele, thank you so much for the kind words and for taking the time to leave us a review! We appreciate you very much! -Anna

reviews.author: Madisyn Speidel
reviews.review: Management is great! They always keep in touch and are fast responders when it comes to concerns. Also maintenance is great as well! Weve had multiple things need fixing and they come in the next day while were at work and fix it for us! Over all, a great place to be housed under!

ownerResponse.text: Hey Madisyn, thank you so much for your kind words! -Anna

reviews.author: Raynee Kalkus
reviews.review: Really quiet even on the weekends, neighbors are friendly but private. Landlord/ property owner is really nice every time I contact them! If there is ever an inconvenience its really tiny and is quick to be handled.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Raynee, I'm happy to hear you feel that way! Thank you so much for the review. -Anna

reviews.author: Roman Johnson
reviews.review: Ive lived in a number of apartments over the years and no property management team cares about their tenants as much as these people. Wonderful people to work with and couldnt recommend them more

ownerResponse.text: Roman, thank you so much. We appreciate you taking the time to write such a nice review! -Anna

reviews.author: ellen dodson
reviews.review: Excellent landlords.  Very responsive to repair needs. Pleasant and professional staff.

ownerResponse.text: Ellen, I'm happy to hear that. Thank you so much for the review! -Anna
Thanks Randy, we appreciate the stars! -Anna
Erica, thank you! We appreciate the 5-star review! -Anna
